rmi

Interface AdminRMIInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RMIServer

    public interface AdminRMIInterface
extends java.rmi.Remote

      • registerPerson

        java.lang.String registerPerson(int ID,
                                java.lang.String name,
                                java.lang.String password,
                                java.lang.String type,
                                int cellphone,
                                java.lang.String address,
                                java.lang.String validityCC)
                         throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        registers a person in the database
        Parameters:
        ID - cartao de cidadao identification number
        name - name of the person to be registered
        password - string which the person needs to use to authenticate himself
        type - 3 types estudantes/docentes/funcionarios
        cellphone - cellphone number of the person
        address - address of the person
        validityCC - expiration date of cartao de cidadao
        Returns:
        result(success or not)
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - common superclass for a number of communication-related exceptions that may occur during the execution of a remote method call (mandatory)

      • createElection

        java.lang.String createElection(java.lang.String title,
                                java.lang.String startDate,
                                java.lang.String endDate,
                                java.lang.String type,
                                java.lang.String membersType,
                                java.lang.String description)
                         throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        creates a new election in the database
        Parameters:
        title - title of the election(there cannot be 2 equal titles)
        startDate - date which the election will start (dd-mm-yy hh:mm)
        endDate - date which the election will end (dd-mm-yy hh:mm)
        type - type election type there's 2 different types (conselho geral and nucleos)
        membersType - if the election is for conselho geral there's 3 members type possible (estudantes/docentes/funcionarios) if the election is for nucleos type can only be estudantes
        description - brief description of the election
        Returns:
        result(success or not)
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - common superclass for a number of communication-related exceptions that may occur during the execution of a remote method call (mandatory)

      • removeElection

        java.lang.String removeElection(java.lang.String title)

        removes an election
        Parameters:
        title - election title to remove
        Returns:
        success or not
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - common superclass for a number of communication-related exceptions that may occur during the execution of a remote method call (mandatory)

      • addList

        java.lang.String addList(java.lang.String name,
                         java.lang.String membersType,
                         java.lang.String election)
                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        adds a list to an election in the database
        Parameters:
        name - name of the list to be added (there can't be 2 lists with the same name)
        membersType - type of constituting members of the list, only valid for conselho geral elections, else it's always estudantes
        election - name of the election this list will run for
        Returns:
        result(success or not)
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - common superclass for a number of communication-related exceptions that may occur during the execution of a remote method call (mandatory)

                                java.lang.String election)
                         throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        adds a voting table to a department for an election from the database
        Parameters:
        department - name of the department where the table will be located (only 1 table allowed per department)
        election - election name to which the table belongs
        Returns:
        result(success or not)

      • changeElection

        java.lang.String changeElection(java.lang.String election,
                                java.lang.String newDate,
                                java.lang.String newFinishDate,
                                java.lang.String newType,
                                java.lang.String newMembersType,
                                java.lang.String description)
                         throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        changes an election properties from the database
        Parameters:
        election - title of the election we want to change the date
        newDate - new date in which we want the election to start
        newFinishDate - new date in which we want the election to finish
        newType - new type of the election
        newMembersType - new members type of the election
        description - new description for the election
        Returns:
        result(success or not)
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - common superclass for a number of communication-related exceptions that may occur during the execution of a remote method call (mandatory)

      • getVoterInfo

        java.lang.String getVoterInfo(int ID,
                              java.lang.String election)
                       throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        gets the time and the table where a voter voted for a certain election
        Parameters:
        ID - identification number of cartao de cidadao of the person who wants to vote
        election - title of the election which we want to know at what time the voter voted
        Returns:
        string with the date in which the voter voted for an election
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - common superclass for a number of communication-related exceptions that may occur during the execution of a remote method call (mandatory)

        election - election title we want to know the info about
        Returns:

        java.lang.String voteInAdvance(int ID,
                               java.lang.String election,
                               java.lang.String vote)
                        throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        allows voters to vote in advance for a certain election
        Parameters:
        ID - ID of the voter who wants to vote in advance
        election - election title in which the voter wants to vote
